ca.uqac.lif.cep

Class ProcessorBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.cep.ProcessorBox
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IoPalette.FileWriterPaletteEntry.FileWriterEditorBox, IoPalette.StreamReaderPaletteEntry.StreamReaderEditorBox, ProcessorBox.GenericEditorBox

    public class ProcessorBox
extends Object
    Information about the graphical representation of a processor in an editor.

    Editorial choice: it could be easier to use BufferedImages instead of byte arrays for processor pictures. However, this would impose a dependency on the java.awt package, just for a single object we don't manipulate or display anyway.

    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©
